attributes.action: Make confectionery item producers change calorific info with the equivalent exercise amount to burn the product off
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to force confectionery producers (e.g. Cadbury) to rid calorific information and change that information into the equivalent exercise needed to burn the specific product off (e.g. Run for 30mins or Swim for 1 hour). In order to increase the understanding of how bad some confectionery products can be.
